#summary How to build x86 NaCl

== Building on Linux ==
 * Check out the Native Client source using gclient
 * `sudo apt-get install g++-multilib libsdl1.2-dev texinfo libcrypto++-dev libssl-dev lib32ncurses5-dev. flex bison` # For Ubuntu Karmic.
 * `cd native_client/tools && make SDKLOC=$(cd .. && echo $(pwd)/src/third_party/nacl_sdk/linux64/sdk)` # Will build the toolchain that is able to compile Native Client modules for platforms: x86-64, x86-32.
 * `cd native_client && ./scons --mode=dbg-linux platform=x86-64` # Build x86-64 binaries.
 * `cd native_client && ./scons --mode=dbg-linux platform=x86-64 small_tests` # Run some tests.
